dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: This is pretty much a human arm alright. I thought they were replacing both of my arms with actual snakes.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg:
Doesn't this lord have the common decency to let his Heishou relax after an all-nighter...? Not a fan of his morning summons.
Eh, guess he's got much to learn, being new in the game and everything~ He'll soon get so stingy with us that he might forget to summon us where we're needed.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
Thought I was losing weight from the stress of going cold turkey on tobacco, but... apparently it's an intended effect of the Si Bolus.
Gotta get used to it, I suppose~ This skin and bones body isn't pretty, but it really does come in handy for our missions.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Daguanyuan gets real quiet around this hour. The lords live in such fancy, luxurious homes... but they can't even get a wink of sleep at night. Being a Heishou's no way to live, but these lords have it pretty rough, too.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Well... Each branch of the Heishou specialize in different jobs, and we snakes benefit from having some flexibility. In both the literal and metaphorical meanings of the word.
We're more like covert operatives; can't go rushing into things like roosters in a cockfight, right?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
I bet these stretchy arms makes me a tricky enemy to fight.
These arms can blindside them by coming in from any distance, any direction.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Us Heishou are a step removed from the complicated network of resentments and favors that Hongyuan folks have, which means that we don't have much reason to hesitate when carrying out our missions.
Resentment is for someone close to you. It'd be weird to take revenge on a tool that goes away just as quickly as they appeared, right?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
I've served every damn family in Hongyuan. The Kongs before they were massacred, the Shis during their decline, and the ever-powerful Jias.
That makes me realize just how long I've survived in this hole. I can feel death just around the corner, but... I just molt outta my slough and come back like nothing happened...

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: I'm a survivor. Been one for a long, long time... but it's all pointless. Life's grown so dull that I've lost all attachment to life and death. But I know that real death'll come when... the last of my emotions erode away.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: ... The lord sent out an order? Oh, man... I gotta stop zoning out like this. Let's hurry on.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Hey, no point in looking around for a way out. I'm all coiled up now, ready to strike. You're not getting out of this.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Don't you hear a snake slithering somewhere?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: This... is a pretty good infiltration route.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Told you to watch yourself around a coiled-up snake.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Now, give it a real good guess. Which direction will my arm strike from?

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Didn't see that coming, did you?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hup...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Clean bite, huh?

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Haah... So death can claim me, after all.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Told you I can handle it, my lord.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Now, ain't that a snake's tail of an ending? A real letdown.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Let some of 'em get away, but I've already marked them with the Deathrite venom. They won't get very far. Let's head back, the lord'll be satisfied.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: With this... looks like I'll be saying goodbye to this lord soon. He made sure he got the bang for his buck, though.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Gonna have to keep things low-key for a while. Failing such an easy mission... guess I'll be sticking with this lord for a bit, huh?
